sentences.en: An uneasy calm is reported to be prevailing in the area.
sentences.cn: 据报道,该地区弥漫着一种令人不安的平静.

sentences.en: He broke from prevailing orthodoxies and asked the awkward questions.
sentences.cn: 他抛开盛行的正统观念，问了一些难以回答的问题。

sentences.en: He wore his hair in the prevailing fashion.
sentences.cn: 他的头发梳的是当时盛行的发型.

sentences.en: Our guideline would be the prevailing world market prices.
sentences.cn: 我们要以当时的国际市场的价格为准绳.

sentences.en: Plague was then prevailing in that city.
sentences.cn: 当时瘟疫正在该城流行.

sentences.en: She wears a fashionable hair style prevailing in the city.
sentences.cn: 她的发型是这个城市流行的款式.

sentences.en: The belts of prevailing westerlies in general have moderate average temperature.
sentences.cn: 一般来说,盛行西风带的气温比较适中.

sentences.en: The direction of the prevailing winds should be taken into account.
sentences.cn: 应该将盛行风的方向考虑在内。

sentences.en: The prevailing current flows from east to west.
sentences.cn: 主道的水流是自东往西的.

sentences.en: the prevailing economic conditions in Northern Ireland
sentences.cn: 北爱尔兰普遍的经济状况

sentences.en: The prevailing mood of public opinion remained hostile.
sentences.cn: 公众仍普遍持敌对情绪。

sentences.en: The prevailing westerly winds gave the battle advantage to the English admirals.
sentences.cn: 盛行的西风助了英国海军将领们的一臂之力.

sentences.en: This really is the prevailing idea of Main Street.
sentences.cn: 这实际上是《大街》的主导思想.

sentences.en: Thrift has become the prevailing practice.
We were horrified at the conditions prevailing in local prisons.
sentences.cn: 地方监狱的普遍状况让我们震惊。

sentences.en: Yellow is the prevailing color in her room.

words.tran_cn: 流行的；一般的，最普通的；占优势的；盛行很广的
盛行，流行（prevail的现在分词形式）；获胜

phrases.tran_cn: 现价，当时价格；普遍价格

trans.tran_cn: 占优势的，主要的，普遍的，盛行的
trans.tran_en: existing or accepted in a particular place or at a particular time

trans.tran_cn: 获胜( prevail的现在分词 )，盛行，说服，（ 思想、观点等）被接受
